display.title: Guiness Storehouse
display.description:
Guiness is the trademark of the city. A lot of the postcards have the image of the Guiness factory. The storehouse is located in an old part of the factory, transformed into a modern museum. The ticket can be booked online and you can avoid the long queues. Plan for around 2 hours. The tour takes you through the process of making beer and it ends in a round glass bar that offers a nice view of the city.

The price of the ticket includes a free beer. Before leaving, checkout the cafeteria: everything there is made with Guiness. My favourite are the Guiness bear with the Guiness stew.
